text_eng:
Enjoy international cuisine at Fountain Cafe, one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including outdoor tennis courts, a health club, and an outdoor pool. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Dubai? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 6425 square feet (597 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 640 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. 39-inch LED televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and complimentary bottled water.
text_hr:
U restoranu Fountain Cafe, jednom od 2 restorana u ovom aparthotelu, oduševit će vas međunarodna kuhinja. Možete i ostati u sobi te iskoristiti prednosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Ako pak poželite male obroke, imate 2 kavane/kafića. Iskoristite rekreacijske mogućnosti uz vanjske teniske terene, rekreacijski klub i vanjski bazen. Ovaj aparthotel nudi i besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) te prostor za arkadne i videoigre. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom i ekspresnu prijavu. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu Dubai? Ovaj objekt (ovaj aparthotel) ima prostore površine 6425 kvadr. st. (597 m²), koji se sastoje od prostorije za sastanke. Na lokaciji se nudi besplatno samostalno parkiranje.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od soba (ukupno 640), koje sadrže čajne kuhinje s hladnjacima i pločama za kuhanje. Zabavljat će vas LED televizori (39 - in) i satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, aparat za kavu/čaj i besplatna voda u boci.

text_eng:
Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an indoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 142 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
text_hr:
Uživajte u obrocima koji nudi restoran ili malim obrocima koje nudi kavana/kafić. U ovaj hotel su vam dostupne i pogodnosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 7.00 do 10.00 uz nadoplatu. Nemojte propustiti rekreacijske mogućnosti uz unutarnji bazen i fitness centar. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i čuvanje djece / brigu o djeci (uz nadoplatu). Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, besplatne novine u predvorju i usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja. Prijevoz od zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatno samostalno parkiranje.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 142 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i hladnjake te LED televizore. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kombinacijama tuša i kade, a nude i besplatne toaletne potrepštine te sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

text_eng:
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 20 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

text_eng: Al Jawhara Metro Hotel is located in Dubai’s Deira district. The Gold Souk is just 2 km away and close to Union Metro station and Al Maktoum Hospital. It features Wi-Fi in all areas. Rooms have a seating area and some have a sofa with plush cushions. Each room is spacious and air-conditioned. Staff at Al Jawhara Metro Hotel’s front desk is available 24/7. The hotel also offers luggage storage space. The restaurant is filled with natural light and offers a range of regional specialities.
text_hr: Hotel Al Jawhara Metro nalazi se u dubaijskoj četvrti Deira, na samo 2 km od tržnice zlatom te u blizini postaje podzemne željeznice Union i bolnice Al Maktoum. U cijelom je objektu dostupan besplatni WiFi. Sobe sadrže prostor za sjedenje, a pojedine obuhvaćaju kauč s mekanim jastucima. Sve sobe su prostrane i klimatizirane. Osoblje recepcije u hotelu Al Jawhara Metro dostupno je 24 sata dnevno, 7 dana u tjednu. Hotel također nudi skladište prtljage. Restoran je ispunjen prirodnim svjetlom i poslužuje niz regionalnih specijaliteta.

Relax with a refreshing drink at the bar/lounge, the poolside bar, or one of 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has facilities measuring 87 square feet (8 square meters), including a conference center. text_eng:
Hotel Doro City is built with modern tastes, elegant and comfortable environment.
Llakmani is owned by the family, which has tradition in the field of hotels and tourism
Located in Tirana, Albania, Hotel Doro City is just a short walk from the centre of Tirana and all the main attractions. The hotel is equipped with an exquisite à-la-carte restaurant and a bar. All rooms at the Doro City offer air-conditioning and Wi-Fi. They are modernly and luxuriously decorated and feature a seating area, a desk and a flat-screen TV. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer. Breakfast is served at the restaurant each morning, while guests can also make use of the snack bar and enjoy a game of tennis at the onsite courts or order massages. The hotel offers 1x 3-course dinner and 1x non alcoholic beverage for guests staying longer than 4 nights. A gift shop is one of the facilities available, while others include room service, dry cleaning services and entertainment staff. The centre of Tirana is 700 metres away. Guests can enjoy a walk along the busy Tirana streets or a drink at the local cafe. Tirana features several parks perfect for refreshing walks. Main Bus Station can be reached in a minute’s walk, while the Mother Teresa International Airport is 16 km away.

Opustite se u spa centru sa širokim spektrom usluga, kojemu su u ponudi i masaže, tretmani za tijelo i tretmani za lice. Možete iskoristiti rekreacijske mogućnosti uz vanjski bazen, spa kadu i saunu. Ovaj hotel nudi i bežični pristup internetu (uz nadoplatu), usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) te frizerski salon. Do obližnjih atrakcija lako je stići autobusom (uz nadoplatu), koji vozi u krugu od 15 km. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju žičani pristup internetu (uz nadoplatu), poslovni centar i usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno na zahtjev) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatna usluga parkiranja.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od soba (ukupno 232), koje sadrže kuhinje s hladnjacima i mikrovalnim pećnicama. Zabavljat će vas LCD televizori (42 - in) i premijske TV kanale, a žičani i bežični pristup internetu dostupni su uz nadoplatu. Privatne kupaonice s kombinacijama tuša i kade opremljene su dubokim kadama i nude dizajnerske toaletne potrepštine. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

text_eng:
Enjoy the mountains and the lake at first hand when staying in the Hotel Seevilla Freiberg Zell am See, and experience the perfect mix of pleasure, activity, and relaxation holidaying in the province of Salzburg. All rooms have breathtaking views of the Zell lake and the surrounding mountains, with the Kitzsteinhorn, Hohe Tauern National Park, Steinernes Meer, and the Kitzbühel Alps. Enjoy being spoiled with the delights served up in the café or the restaurant with its lakeside terrace, and create some free space for yourself when holidaying right by the lake, whether on a summer holiday in Zell am See, or a skiing holiday in Zell am See.
Located right on the shore of Lake Zell, Seehotel Freiberg offers a balcony or terrace with lake views in each room. It is just an 8-minute walk from the centre of Zell am See and the ski lifts, with a free ski shuttle offered in winter. The Seehotel’s light-flooded design rooms offer satellite TV, a minibar, a seating area, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Most feature a flat-screen TV. 2 saunas, a steam bath, a Kneipp pool, and an infrared cabin are available in the spa area. Guests can enjoy a wide range of massage and beauty treatments. The fitness room offers direct lake views. The restaurant features a winter garden overlooking the lake, as well as a lakeside terrace. It serves international and Austrian cuisine made from regional products. Half-board includes a breakfast buffet and a 4-course dinner with a choice of dishes and a salad bar. Surrounded by a 3,000 m² garden, Seehotel Freiberg features a private beach on the lake. Free private parking is available on site. In summer, the Zell am See-Kaprun Card is included in the price. This card comprises free benefits and discounts in the entire region.
text_hr: Hotel Seevilla Freiberg smješten je neposredno uz obalu jezera Zell. Sve hotelske sobe obuhvaćaju balkon ili terasu s pogledom na jezero. Do središta mjesta Zell am See i žičara ima svega 8 minuta hoda. U zimskim je mjesecima dostupan besplatni autobus do skijališta. Sve iznimno svijetle i dizajnerski uređene sobe hotela Seevilla uključuju TV sa satelitskim programima, mini bar, prostor za sjedenje te kupaonicu sa sušilom za kosu. Većina sadrži TV s ravnog ekrana. Hotel obuhvaća spa centar s 2 saune, parnom kupkom, bazenom za Kneippovu terapiju i infracrvenom kabinom. Gosti mogu uživati u širokom izboru masažnih i kozmetičkih tretmana. Iz dvorane za fitness pruža se izravan pogled na jezero. Restoran nudi zimski vrt s pogledom na jezero i terasu uz jezero. Ondje se poslužuju jela međunarodne i austrijske kuhinje pripremljena od regionalnih proizvoda. U cijenu polupansiona uključeni su bife doručak te večera u 4 slijeda s izborom jela i švedskim stolom sa salatama. Hotel Seevilla Freiberg okružen je vrtom površine 3000 metara kvadratnih i obuhvaća privatnu plažu uz jezero. U okviru objekta na raspolaganju je besplatno privatno parkiralište. Ljeti je u cijenu boravka uključena kartica Zell am See-Kaprun kojom gosti ostvaruju besplatne pogodnosti i popuste diljem regije.
